      • keepAlive

        @Deprecated
public SocketSettings.Builder keepAlive(boolean keepAlive)
        已过时。 configuring keep-alive has been deprecated. It now defaults to true and disabling it is not recommended.
        Sets keep-alive.
        参数:
        keepAlive - false if keep-alive should be disabled
        返回:
        this
        另请参阅:
        Does TCP keep-alive time affect MongoDB Deployments?
